question.content:
In this assignment, let's build a Portfolio Website About Me & Skills Sections by applying the concepts we learned till now. **Refer to the below images.** The following images illustrate all device sizes, from extra small to extra large. Extra Small (Size < 576px) and Small (Size >= 576px):

Medium (Size >= 768px), Large (Size >= 992px) and Extra Large (Size >= 1200px): Try to achieve the design as close as possible.
#### Resources Use the image URLs given below. - [https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-about-me-img.png](https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-about-me-img.png) - [https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-skills-html-img.png](https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-skills-html-img.png) - [https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-skills-css-img.png](https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-skills-css-img.png) - [https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-skills-bootstrap-img.png](https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-skills-bootstrap-img.png) - [https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-skills-js-img.png](https://d1tgh8fmlzexmh.cloudfront.net/ccbp-responsive-website/portfolio-skills-js-img.png) **CSS Colors used:**

question.short_text: Portfolio Website About Me & Skills Sections

test_cases.display_text: Page should consist of an HTML image element
Page should consist of an HTML container element with the bootstrap class name container
Page should consist of an HTML container element with the bootstrap class name row
Page should consist of an HTML container element with the bootstrap grid column class name in medium devices that starts with col-md-
Page should consist of an HTML container element with the bootstrap order class name in medium devices that starts with order-md-
Page should consist of an HTML container element with the bootstrap display class name in medium devices that starts with d-md-
Page should consist of an HTML container element with the bootstrap class name d-none
Page should consist of an HTML container element with the bootstrap class name shadow

code_details.code_content:
Facts

About me

My name is Jenny Wilson, and I am currently looking for a job in Frontend Development. I have 3 years of experience working as a Frontend Developer. I have a bachelor’s degree in Electronics and Communication. People find me to be an upbeat, self-motivated team player with excellent communication skills.

I am a dedicated person with a family of four. I enjoy reading, and the knowledge and perspective that my reading gives me have strengthened my teaching skills and presentation abilities.
